title: A Nouche
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Mediterranean, Juice bar, Bakery, Armenian
description: Vegetarian cafe opened May 2015 offering traditional, fruit-and-nut based Armenian confectionery made of natural ingredients, vegan and gluten-free, plus a menu of coffee, tea, fresh juices and smoothies. Also serves cold and hot sandwiches, waffles and crepes. Has a stand in BioBazar on Saturdays (Hala 4).
